name: about
description: Displays some basic information to help you get started with Bastion.

name: calculate
description: Evaluates the specified mathematical expression.

options.name: expression
options.description: The expression you want to evaluate.

name: changes
description: See the changes introduced in the current version of Bastion.

name: channel
description: Command Group - channel

options.name: create
options.description: Create a new channel in the server.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new channel.

options.name: type
options.description: The type of the new channel.

options.name: topic
options.description: The topic for the new channel.

options.name: limit
options.description: Limit the number of users for the new (voice) channel.

options.name: slowmode
options.description: Enable slowmode with the specified interval (in seconds).

options.name: nsfw
options.description: Should the channel be NSFW.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for creating the channel.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete the current (or the specified) channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to delete.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for deleting the channel.

options.name: info
options.description: Displays information on the current (or specified) channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel whose information you want to display.

options.name: update
options.description: Update the specified channel in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to update.

options.name: name
options.description: The new name for the channel.

options.name: topic
options.description: The new topic for the channel.

options.name: limit
options.description: The new limit of users for the (voice) channel.

options.name: slowmode
options.description: The new slowmode interval (in seconds).

options.name: nsfw
options.description: Should the channel be NSFW.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for updating the channel.

name: claim
description: Claim any rewards available to you.

name: comic
description: Command Group - comic

options.name: garfield
options.description: Check the latest Garfield comic.

options.name: phd
options.description: Check the latest PHD comic, or the specified issue.

options.name: issue
options.description: Issue number to see the comic.

options.name: xkcd
options.description: Check the latest xkcd comic, or the specified issue.

options.name: issue
options.description: Issue number to see the comic.

name: config
description: Command Group - config

options.name: auto-roles
options.description: Configure roles that will be auto assigned to members when they join the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to add or remove as an auto role.

options.name: bots
options.description: Whether this role should be auto assigned to bots.

options.name: auto-threads
options.description: Configure auto threads in the server.

options.name: farewell
options.description: Configure farewell messages in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the farewell messages will be sent.

options.name: message
options.description: The custom farewell message.

options.name: timeout
options.description: The interval after which the farewell message will be deleted.

options.name: filter
options.description: Subcommand Group - filter

options.name: emails
options.description: Configure Email Filter AutoMod rule in the server.

options.name: invites
options.description: Configure Invite Filter AutoMod rule in the server.

options.name: links
options.description: Configure Link Filter AutoMod rule in the server.

options.name: gambling
options.description: Configure gambling in the server.

options.name: multiplier
options.description: The reward multiplier.

options.name: gamification
options.description: Configure gamification in the server.

options.name: messages
options.description: Should it show the level up messages.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the level up messages will be sent.

options.name: multiplier
options.description: The reward multiplier.

options.name: greeting
options.description: Configure greeting messages in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the greeting messages will be sent.

options.name: message
options.description: The custom greeting message.

options.name: timeout
options.description: The interval after which the greeting message will be deleted.

options.name: live-streams
options.description: Follow streamers and get notified in the specified channel when they go live.

options.name: twitch
options.description: The twitch channel you want to follow.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the notifications will be sent.

options.name: message
options.description: The custom message for notification.

options.name: logs
options.description: Subcommand Group - logs

options.name: content
options.description: Configure whether deleted and edited message content should be shown in server logs.

options.name: mod
options.description: Configure channel for logging moderation events.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where moderation events will be logged.

options.name: server
options.description: Configure channel for logging server events.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where server events will be logged.

options.name: music
options.description: Configure music in the server.

options.name: reports
options.description: Configure user reports in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where user reports will be sent.

options.name: select-roles
options.description: Subcommand Group - select-roles

options.name: add
options.description: Create a new Select Role Group.

options.name: message
options.description: The content of the Select Role Message for users.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where you want to send the Select Role Message.

options.name: type
options.description: The behavior of the Select Role Group.

options.name: ui
options.description: The variant of Select Role UI.

options.name: min
options.description: The minimum number of roles users are allowed to select.

options.name: max
options.description: The maximum number of roles users are allowed to select.

options.name: list
options.description: List all the Select Role Groups.

options.name: channel
options.description: List Select Role Groups only from this channel.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove the specified Select Role Group.

options.name: id
options.description: The Select Role Group ID.

options.name: self-roles
options.description: Configure roles that users can assign to themselves.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to add or remove as a self role.

options.name: starboard
options.description: Configure starboard in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where starred messages will be logged.

options.name: threshold
options.description: The minimum number of stars a message needs.

options.name: streamer-role
options.description: Set the role someone is assigned in the server when they start streaming.

options.name: role
options.description: The role that should be assigned to users.

options.name: suggestions
options.description: Configure suggestions in the server.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where suggestions will be sent.

options.name: triggers
options.description: Configure triggers and responses in the server.

options.name: add
options.description: The pattern that will trigger the response.

options.name: remove
options.description: The trigger that you want to remove.

options.name: message
options.description: The message response for the trigger.

options.name: emoji
options.description: The reaction emoji response for the trigger.

options.name: verification
options.description: Configure verification in the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role users are assigned when are verified.

options.name: text
options.description: Type a text message that will be shown to the users trying to verify.

options.name: voice-sessions
options.description: Configure voice sessions in the server.

options.name: create
options.description: Name of the new voice session category.

options.name: voting-channels
options.description: Configure voting channels in the server.

options.name: add
options.description: The channel you want to add as a voting channel.

options.name: remove
options.description: The channel you want to remove as a voting channel.

name: donate
description: See the ways you can contribute to support the Bastion bot project.

name: emoji
description: Command Group - emoji

options.name: info
options.description: Displays information on the specified custom emoji.

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji you want to display.

name: games
description: Command Group - games

options.name: 8ball
options.description: Ask any question to the magic 8 ball and get answers.

options.name: question
options.description: The question you want to ask the magic 8 ball.

options.name: flip
options.description: Flip coins and see the result.

options.name: coins
options.description: The number of coins to flip.

options.name: roll
options.description: Roll dice and see the result. Supports dice notation.

options.name: notation
options.description: The dice notation.

options.name: rps
options.description: Play rock paper scissor with Bastion.

options.name: choice
options.description: Your choice.

options.name: russian-roulette
options.description: Play a game of Russian roulette.

options.name: rounds
options.description: The number rounds you want to play.

name: game-server
description: Fetch information from nearly any game server that makes its status publicly available.

options.name: game
options.description: The game ID for the game server.

options.name: hostname
options.description: The IP address or domain name of the game server.

options.name: port
options.description: The connection port number of the game server. Use the query port if connection port doesn't work.

name: gamestats
description: Command Group - gamestats

options.name: aimlab
options.description: Check stats of any Aim Lab player.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the player.

options.name: apex
options.description: Check stats of any Apex Legends player.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the player.

options.name: platform
options.description: The platform of the player.

options.name: csgo
options.description: Check stats of any Counter-Strike: Global Offensive player.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the player.

options.name: fortnite
options.description: Check stats of any Fortnite player.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the player.

options.name: platform
options.description: The platform of the player.

options.name: overwatch
options.description: Check stats of any Overwatch 2 player.

options.name: username
options.description: The BattleTag or username of the player.

options.name: platform
options.description: The platform of the player.

options.name: region
options.description: The region of the player.

options.name: rainbow6
options.description: Check stats of any Rainbow 6 player.

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the player.

options.name: platform
options.description: The platform of the player.

options.name: valorant
options.description: Check stats of any Valorant player.

options.name: username
options.description: The name tag of the player.

options.name: region
options.description: The region of the account.

name: give
description: Give Bastion Coins and Experience Points to server members or take it from them.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose coins and XP will be updated.

options.name: coins
options.description: The amount of coins you want to give or take.

options.name: xp
options.description: The amount of XP you want to give or take.

name: giveaway
description: Run giveaways in the server.

options.name: title
options.description: The title for the giveaway.

options.name: description
options.description: The description for the giveaway.

options.name: winners
options.description: The number of winners for the giveaway.

options.name: timer
options.description: Number of hours the giveaway should run.

name: iam
description: Assign a self assignable role to yourself.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to assign yourself.

name: invite
description: Generates an instant invite for the server.

options.name: temporary
options.description: Kick the members if they aren't assigned a role within 24 hours.

name: leaderboard
description: Displays the server's leaderboard. You're ranked based on their level, XP, karma, and Bastion Coins.

name: lmgtfy
description: Send a LMGTFY link for the search query that teaches people how to do an internet search.

options.name: query
options.description: The search query.

options.name: site
options.description: The search engine to use.

name: message
description: Command Group - message

options.name: clear
options.description: Clear recent messages (newer than two weeks) in the channel.

options.name: limit
options.description: Limit the numbers of messages that should be deleted.

options.name: bots
options.description: Should it delete messages from bots.

options.name: pinned
options.description: Should it delete messages that are pinned.

options.name: system
options.description: Should it delete system messages.

options.name: user
options.description: Only delete messages from this user.

name: music
description: Command Group - music

options.name: join
options.description: Moves you to the voice channel where Bastion is currently connected.

options.name: now
options.description: Shows the song playing right now.

options.name: pause
options.description: Pause the music playback in the voice channel.

options.name: play
options.description: Play a specified song in the server.

options.name: song
options.description: The song name or link you want to play.

options.name: queue
options.description: Displays the current music queue in the server.

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove songs matching the specified text from the music queue.

options.name: clear
options.description: Remove all songs from the music queue.

options.name: resume
options.description: Resume the music playback in the voice channel.

options.name: shuffle
options.description: Shuffle the current music queue.

options.name: skip
options.description: Skip the current music track that's being played in the voice channel.

options.name: stop
options.description: Stop the music playback and disconnect from the voice channel.

name: poll
description: Run polls in the server.

options.name: question
options.description: The question for the poll.

options.name: option1
options.description: The 1st option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option2
options.description: The 2nd option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option3
options.description: The 3rd option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option4
options.description: The 4th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option5
options.description: The 5th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option6
options.description: The 6th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option7
options.description: The 7th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option8
options.description: The 8th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option9
options.description: The 9th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: option10
options.description: The 10th option for the poll's answer.

options.name: timer
options.description: Number of hours the poll should run.

name: profile
description: Displays the Bastion profile of the specified user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose profile you want to display.

name: report
description: Report a server member to the moderators of the server.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to report.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason you want to report the user.

name: role
description: Command Group - role

options.name: config
options.description: Set the description & emoji of the specified role.

options.name: role
options.description: The role which you want to configure.

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji you want to set as the role emoji.

options.name: description
options.description: A description for the role (max 100 characters).

options.name: create
options.description: Create a new role in the server.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new role.

options.name: color
options.description: The color for the new role (in HEX code).

options.name: icon
options.description: The icon for the new role (Image URL or Emoji).

options.name: hoist
options.description: Should the members be displayed separately from others.

options.name: mentionable
options.description: Should the role be mentionable.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for creating the role.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete the specified role.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to delete.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for deleting the role.

options.name: info
options.description: Displays information on the specified role.

options.name: role
options.description: The role whose information you want to display.

options.name: levels
options.description: Configure level roles. When members reach a level, they get assigned to roles in the level.

options.name: role
options.description: The role that should be assigned to users.

options.name: level
options.description: The level at which the role should be assigned.

options.name: remove
options.description: The level which you want to remove.

options.name: update
options.description: Update the specified role in the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to update.

options.name: name
options.description: The new name for the role.

options.name: color
options.description: The new color for the role (in HEX code).

options.name: icon
options.description: The new icon for the role (Image URL or Emoji).

options.name: hoist
options.description: Should the members be displayed separately from others.

options.name: mentionable
options.description: Should the role be mentionable.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for updating the role.

name: say
description: Replies with the message you ask it to say.

options.name: message
options.description: The message you want Bastion to say.

name: search
description: Command Group - search

options.name: anime
options.description: Searches for information on the specified anime.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the anime.

options.name: apod
options.description: Displays the astronomy picture of the day from NASA.

options.name: cryptocurrency
options.description: Searches for information on the specified crypto currency.

options.name: symbol
options.description: The symbol of the crypto currency.

options.name: definitions
options.description: Displays the definitions for the specified word.

options.name: word
options.description: The word you want to lookup.

options.name: game
options.description: Searches for information on the specified game.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the game.

options.name: manga
options.description: Searches for information on the specified manga.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the manga.

options.name: movie
options.description: Searches for information on the specified movie.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the movie.

options.name: pokemon
options.description: Searches for information on the specified pokémon.

options.name: name
options.description: The name (or number) of the Pokémon.

options.name: redirects
options.description: Follows all the redirects in the specified URL and displays the final URL.

options.name: url
options.description: The URL you want to follow.

options.name: tv
options.description: Searches for information on the specified TV show.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the TV show.

options.name: urban-dictionary
options.description: Searches Urban Dictionary for the specified word.

options.name: word
options.description: The word you want to lookup.

options.name: weather
options.description: Displays the weather forcast of the specified location.

options.name: location
options.description: The location for the weather forcast.

options.name: wikipedia
options.description: Searches Wikipedia for the specified query.

options.name: query
options.description: The search query.

name: server
description: Command Group - server

options.name: info
options.description: Displays information on the server.

options.name: prune
options.description: Kicks the inactive members (without any roles) from the server.

options.name: days
options.description: The number of days of inactivity required for kicking.

options.name: role
options.description: Inactive members check includes this role.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for pruning the inactive members.

name: status
description: Displays Bastion's status. You can also see Discord's status.

options.name: shard
options.description: Displays the status of the current shard.

name: su
description: Command Group - su

options.name: eval
options.description: Evaluate JavaScript code in Bastion's context.

options.name: code
options.description: The code you want to execute.

options.name: public
options.description: Display the output to everyone.

options.name: exec
options.description: Execute terminal commands on the system where Bastion is running.

options.name: command
options.description: The command you want to execute.

options.name: public
options.description: Display the output to everyone.

options.name: reload
options.description: Reload Bastion's settings.

options.name: shutdown
options.description: Shutdown Bastion directly from Discord.

name: suggest
description: Send a suggestion to the server staff.

options.name: suggestion
options.description: What do you want to suggest?

name: thread
description: Command Group - thread

options.name: close
options.description: Close and lock the thread.

options.name: name
options.description: Change the name of the thread.

options.name: name
options.description: The new name for the thread.

name: translate
description: Translates the specified text from one language to another.

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to translate.

options.name: to
options.description: The language you want to translate to.

options.name: from
options.description: The language you want to translate from.

name: user
description: Command Group - user

options.name: avatar
options.description: Displays the avatar of the specified user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose avatar you want to display.

options.name: info
options.description: Displays information on the specified user.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose information you want to display.

options.name: infractions
options.description: Configure infraction actions and displays infractions of the specified user.

options.name: timeout
options.description: Number of violations after which a user is timed out.

options.name: kick
options.description: Number of violations after which a user is kicked.

options.name: ban
options.description: Number of violations after which a user is banned.

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose infractions you want to display.

options.name: remove
options.description: The infraction you want to remove from the user.

name: warn
description: Warn server members and add infractions to their server profile.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to warn.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the warning.
